programme.desc: Action-packed sequel to the sci-fi comedy about a top secret government task force set up to deal with unruly extraterrestrials. An MIB agent turns to his former mentor to help him save the world from a rampaging, shape-shifting alien who has taken on the outward appearance of a sexy lingerie model(n)

programme.title: The Simpsons Movie
programme.desc: Riotous big-screen animated adventures of the cartoon characters from the TV series. Homer triggers an environmental calamity in Springfield that has far-reaching effects for the town and the planet(n)

programme.title: My Big Fat Greek Wedding
programme.desc: Sick of being bullied by her overpowering Greek family, dowdy Toula signs up for college. Despite every warning, Toula falls for a non-Greek guy, and it's not easy getting her clan to accept him. Comedy(n)

programme.title: Hollywood Ending
programme.desc: A witty script and a great ensemble cast add up to one of Woody Allen's most hilarious farces. Allen wrote, directed and stars as a washed-up filmmaker who is suddenly stricken with psychosomatic blindness on the eve of his big comeback(n)

programme.title: Be Cool
programme.desc: Mobster Chili Palmer ditches the movie business for the music industry when he decides to manage a singer in this sequel(n)

programme.title: Rat Race
programme.desc: Gag-meister Jerry Zucker serves up another cracking comedy with a cast to die for. John Cleese plays a Las Vegas casino owner who decides to set up a special event for his highest rollers. Lucky tokens in his slot machines entitle six punters to enter a race across America with $2million as the prize. He'll make a killing on the bets placed on the players while the contestants dash for the cash(n)

programme.title: Shakespeare in Love
programme.desc: Tom Stoppard provided the witty and intelligent script for John Madden's romantic comedy in which young Will Shakespeare struggles with writer's block and money worries while trying to complete Romeo and Ethel: The Pirate's Daughter. Gwyneth Paltrow once more employs her faultless English accent, playing aristocratic Viola de Lesseps, who is shortly to be married off but yearns to slum it as an actor. Disguising herself as a boy in order to be allowed on stage, Viola becomes Will's muse, and the more familiar tale of Romeo and Juliet begins to take shape as the couple fall passionately in love. The film is littered with knowing lines and energetically supported by a stellar cast, including Judy Dench as Queen Elizabeth - a cameo performance which earned her one of the movie's seven Oscars(n)

programme.title: Men in Black II
programme.desc: Action-packed sequel to the sci-fi comedy about a top secret government task force set up to deal with unruly extraterrestrials. An MIB agent turns to his former mentor to help him save the world from a rampaging, shape-shifting alien who has taken on the outward appearance of a sexy lingerie model(n)

programme.sub-title: Dan Savage; Richard A. Clarke; Dan Abrams; Katty Kay; Michael Steele
programme.desc: Dan Savage; Richard A. Clarke; Dan Abrams; Katty Kay; Michael Steele. Advice columnist Dan Savage; counter-terrorism expert Richard A. Clarke. The roundtable guests are legal analyst Dan Abrams, news anchor Katty Kay and political analyst Michael Steele(n)

programme.title: Be Cool
programme.desc: Mobster Chili Palmer ditches the movie business for the music industry when he decides to manage a singer in this sequel(n)

programme.title: Spring Breakdown
programme.desc: Spring break gets totally wild when thirtysomething friends Gayle (Amy Poehler), Becky (Parker Posey) and Judi (Rachel Dratch) go vacationing at a popular resort frequented by college coeds in order to prevent a politician's daughter from embarrassing her family(n)

programme.title: Earth Girls Are Easy
programme.desc: In this madcap comedy, Geena Davis plays Valerie, a manicurist living in the valley with her cold fiancé, Dr. Ted Gallagher (Charles Rocket). At the Curl Up and Dye beauty salon where she works, Valerie enlists the help of her boss, Candy Pink (Julie Brown), for some style advice to try and win back Ted's affections. After undergoing a brand-new hairstyle, Valerie learns that Ted is having an affair and she kicks him out of the house. Soon, while lounging around in her bikini, a spaceship from the planet Jhazzalan crash-lands in her swimming pool. Curious, Valerie befriends the ship's inhabitants -- three horny aliens covered in fur named Mac (Jeff Goldblum), Whiploc (Jim Carrey), and Zeebo (Damon Wayans). Introducing her new friends to Candy, the aliens get a shave and a total makeover transformation into hot, available dates. They all go out dancing at L.A. nightclubs and party(n)

programme.title: Protocol
programme.desc: A cocktail waitress accidentally saves the life of an important visiting Arab diplomat when she takes a bullet in her behind. Thrown into the media spotlight, she is then recruited by the US Department of Protocol but soon finds that the world of political chicanery is not best suited to her particular talents(n)

programme.title: Mr. Baseball
programme.desc: A former American baseball star, now considered a has-been, is signed to play for a Japanese league in this comedy. Cultures clash as the player at first fails to take his new teammates seriously, but he soon finds his love of the game rejuvenated by their fresh perspective(n)

programme.title: Crooklyn
programme.desc: Portrait of a close-knit black family living in 1970s Brooklyn, as seen through the eyes of the youngest daughter. This deeply moving comedy-drama follows them as they deal with money woes, eccentric neighbors and the sons' troublemaking(n)

programme.title: Mafia!
programme.desc: Jay Mohr and Lloyd Bridges (in his last role) star in this parody of the "Godfather" trilogy. The story centers on a powerful Mafia family, targeted by rivals who can't wait to see the aging Don (Bridges) and his potential successor out of the way of their glorious plans for the future of organized crime. Christina Applegate, Olympia Dukakis, Billy Burke, Pamela Gidley(n)

programme.title: Get Smart
programme.desc: Bumbling agent Maxwell Smart (Steve Carell), of the top-secret agency CONTROL, teams up with Agent 99 (Anne Hathaway), a lethal beauty, to protect the world from the forces of KAOS. But can the world survive the chaos Max inadvertently creates? Alan Arkin, Dwayne Johnson, Terence Stamp(n)

programme.title: Mamma Mia!
programme.desc: Sophie (Amanda Seyfried) has one wish for her wedding day: to have her father walk her down the aisle. Now she just has to figure out who he is. Meryl Streep, Julie Waters, Christine Baranski, Pierce Brosnan, Colin Firth and Stellan Skarsgard round up the stellar cast of this irresistibly charming musical adventure that celebrates mothers, daughters, fathers and true love to the rhythm of some uniquely catchy tunes. Based on the Broadway smash-hit and filled with the ABBA songs you know and love, the film will make you dance, jive and have the time of your life(n)

programme.title: The Breakfast Club
programme.desc: Forced to spend a Saturday detention in school, five disparate high school kids find that they have more in common than they ever realized. Romantic comedy drama staring Emilio Estevez. (1985)(n)

programme.title: Little Nicky
programme.desc: The Lord of Darkness wants to retire but none of his three sons seems good enough for the job. When he decides he will not cede his throne to any of them, the two most powerful ones escape to Earth to create a kingdom for themselves. This action closes the portal filtering sinful souls to Hell and causes Satan to begin withering away. Now it's up to the weak but beloved Nicky to save his dad and the humankind before one of his brothers becomes the new Satan(n)

Unfortunately, her father, Tom (Sam Robards), was severely injured on Mount Everest and requires a costly surgery to repair his spine. programme.title: Sister Act 2: Back in the Habit
programme.desc: In the sequel to the hit comedy Sister Act, Whoopie Goldberg reprises her role of Deloris Van Cartier, a Las Vegas entertainer who hid out with in a convent of nuns to avoid a nasty bunch of gangsters. In Sister Act 2: Back in the Habit, Deloris is persuaded to return to the convent by the Mother Superior (Maggie Smith), because her help is needed in teaching their choral students at St. Francis High in San Francisco. However, St. Francis is in a crisis, since the administrator running the school (James Coburn) is threatening to shut the place down. If the gospel choir wins first place in a singing contest in Los Angeles, St. Francis will be saved from the priest's plans. Though the plot is rather thin and derivative, Sister Act 2 is lighthearted fun, thanks to good musical numbers and winning performances from the cast(n)

programme.title: August Rush
programme.desc: Estranged from his parents by circumstance and nudged toward a foster family, a young boy seeks out his long-lost folks and discovers prodigious musical talent in this family-oriented drama from Disco Pigs director Kirsten Sheridan. In the aftermath of a passionate night together above New York's Washington Square, a charismatic Irish guitarist named Louis (Jonathan Rhys-Meyers) and a reserved cellist named Lyla (Keri Russell) are forced apart by fate. Despite the fact that they do not remain together, however, their fleeting union has created something amazing that neither could have ever anticipated -- a baby. Unfortunately, just after the child's birth, the mother is misinformed that the infant has died. Cut to 11 years later, when the child, Evan, is living in a Gotham-area boys' home and has developed an acute ability to listen to the sounds of the outside world -- hoping against all hope that his biological mother and father will turn up to claim him, while those in charge try to encourage him to open himself up to the possibility of adoption. Unduly rejecting these bids, Evan runs away into the city. Out on the streets, the child falls into the clutches of a manipulative, untrustworthy street person named Wizard (Robin Williams), who renames Evan "August Rush" and opens the boy up to the depth and breadth of his own musical talent even as he smells the opportunity to grow rich off of the foundling. Meanwhile, Evan/August's hope persists that he will be reunited with his folks, and Louis and Lyla, unable to forget their initial night of love, feel themselves being drawn back together by fate(n)

programme.title: Martin Lawrence Live: Runteldat
programme.desc: The comic and star of film and television fires on all cylinders in this stand-up performance at Constitution Hall in Washington, D.C. Playfully profane innuendo and graphic gestures abound as Lawrence riffs on sex, love, race, drugs and family life, and even reflects on his legal and health troubles(n)

programme.title: Leatherheads
programme.desc: Sneaky gridiron coach Jimmy hires Carter to be his star. Then they both fall for the same girl(n)

programme.title: Rails & Ties
programme.desc: Kevin Bacon, Marcia Gay Harden, and Miles Heizer star in director Alison Eastwood's tale of two families locked into an emotional -- and physical -- collision course. There once was a time when Tom and Megan Stark had all the time in the world to take their dream vacation and start a family, but these days the couple's marriage is suffering and their time appears to be running short. Megan has been diagnosed with a potentially terminal illness, and when the prospect of losing his wife becomes too much to bear, railroad engineer Tom seeks escape in his work. On the tracks Tom is in control; all the routes are predetermined and he knows he'll eventually arrive at his destination. But sometimes even the most predictable events can go suddenly awry, and when Tom's train hits a car that was parked on the tracks by a suicidal mother, his life is plunged into ruin. While there was no way that Tom could have possibly stopped the train on time, the grieving conductor's woes are suddenly compounded upon realizing that he may lose his job because of the accident. Not only that, but the deceased woman's son, Davey, is consumed by the guilt that he could do nothing to prevent the accident, and he now places the blame for his mother's death squarely on Tom. But not all sad stories have to end in tragedy, and perhaps in the aftermath of this fateful accident Megan could receive a second chance at fulfilling her dreams, Tom could learn to open his heart before he is consumed by bitterness, and Davey could finally learn the true meaning of family(n)

programme.title: Kicks
programme.desc: A black 15-year-old finally gets his hands on a coveted pair of Air Jordan sneakers, only to see them stolen by a local thug. With the help of two of his friends, he decides to embark on an adventure through inner-city Oakland to retrieve them(n)

programme.title: The Children
programme.desc: As directed by Brit Tom Shankland, this outing constitutes a chilling installment in the subgenre of horror films about evil children running amok. The tale unfolds in contemporary England during a snowy, late December, with a young married couple, Jonah (Stephen Campbell Moore) and Elaine (Eva Birthistle), journeying into the country to spend New Year's with immediate family -- Elaine's sister Chloe (Rachel Shelley) and brother-in-law Robbie (Jeremy Sheffield). Accompanying the adults are three children: Casey (Hannah Tointon), Elaine's adolescent daughter from a first marriage (who resents being dragged along), and youngsters Paulie (William Howes) and Miranda (Eva Sayer), her children with Jonah (who can't wait to see their cousins Nicky and Leah). Upon arrival at Robbie and Chloe's home, ominous and increasingly bizarre events begin to transpire: Paulie grows visibly ill, Leah and Nicky begin slipping into menacing and threatening behavior toward everyone, capped off by an ugly accident that they engineer involving Robbie -- an incident that pushes him to the brink of death and ends with a gruesome act of carnage committed by the children. Soon, Elaine realizes that Paulie is infected with a bizarre, zombie-like virus that he is systematically spreading to the other children, and promptly decides to ameliorate the situation by taking violence into her own hands and ending the boy's young life. Little does she realize, however, just how pervasive the virus has grown(n)

programme.title: Making of 'Now You See Me 2'
programme.desc: A look at "Now You See Me 2," the 2016 sequel to the 2013 thriller that follows the Four Horsemen's return to perform a spectacular stunt in the hopes of clearing their name and exposing the unscrupulous behavior of a tech mogul. The film stars Jesse Eisenberg, Mark Ruffalo and Woody Harrelson, and is directed by Jon M. Chu(n)

programme.title: Boiler Room
programme.desc: Giovanni Ribisi is an intelligent college dropout who joins a small stock brokerage firm, where he soon becomes one of their top salesmen in the heated atmosphere of the 'boiler room' alongside Vin Diesel and Nicky Katt. But as he rises up the ladder, so he learns of the firm's illegal actions and tries to get his father, a judge, to help him. However, Rifkin refuses and, tapped by the Fbi, Ribisi has one chance to save innocents from fraud - he must testify against his company. Ben Younger's tough drama also stars Ben Affleck, Nia Long and Scott Caan(n)

programme.title: The Color of Money
programme.desc: Drama in which Paul Newman reprises his role from The Hustler. 'Fast' Eddie Felson, an aging liquor salesman, is inspired by talented youngster Vincent to revisit the old days and take up the pool cue after a 25-year break. With the aid of the young man's girlfriend, he encourages his new-found apprentice to learn the hustler's art in backwater pool halls. It isn't long before both headstrong protege and mentor are gunning for the same big bucks(n)

programme.title: Rain Man
programme.desc: Young hustler Charlie Babbitt feels cheated when he is disinherited in favour of his autistic older brother, who he never knew existed. Charlie kidnaps him from the asylum and they head for California, learning much about each other on the way. Hoffman won an Oscar as Best Actor for his role(n)

programme.title: Mission: Impossible II
programme.desc: Tom Cruise returns as both producer and agent Ethan Hunt in his second action-adventure adaptation of the television series. Directed by John Woo, the action speeds across the continents, as Ethan accepts his latest mission: retrieve and destroy the supply of a genetically modified disease called Chimera, as well as recover the cure, Bellerophon, from of a group of terrorists led by Sean Ambrose. For the mission to succeed, Ethan must persuade jewel thief Nyah Hall to join him, which he does by nearly running her car off a cliff. When Nyah becomes infected with the disease, Ethan must battle to save the woman he now loves, even if that means sending her into enemy territory, and the hands of her ex-boyfriend. Also starring Ving Rhames. Edited for violence and language(n)

programme.title: Born on the Fourth of July
programme.desc: Director Oliver Stone's harrowing, double-Oscar-winning Vietnam War drama, which tells the true story of crusading veteran Ron Kovic(n)

programme.title: Interview With the Vampire
programme.desc: A sombre vampire mesmerises a young reporter with the story of his ghastly transformation from grieving aristocrat to immortal monster, beginning in 18th-century New Orleans with his first encounters with the charismatic and decadent bloodsucker Lestat. The two vamps remain deeply, if reluctantly, connected over the years, while becoming intimately involved with others of their kind(n)

programme.title: Risky Business
programme.desc: Enterprising teenager Joel Goodsen turns his parents' house into a brothel when they go out of town on a trip(n)

programme.title: Minority Report
programme.desc: A cop in hi-tech "pre-crime" unit in 2054 goes on the run after being labeled as a future killer. In order to prove his innocence, he kidnaps one of the psychics who predicts the imminent crimes while eluding a determined G-man(n)

programme.title: The Blues Brothers
programme.desc: Expanding on their Saturday Night Live characters, John Belushi and Dan Aykroyd star as Jake and Elwood Blues, two white boys with black soul. Sporting cool shades and look-alike suits, Jake and Elwood are dispatched on a "mission from God" by their former teacher, Sister Mary Stigmata (Kathleen Freeman). Said mission is to raise $5000 to save an orphanage. In the course of their zany adventures, the Blues Brothers run afoul of neo-Nazi Henry Gibson, perform the theme from Rawhide before the most unruly bar crowd in written history, and lay waste to hundreds of cars on the streets and freeways of Chicago. In case you aren't swept up in the infectuous nuttiness of the brothers Blue, you might have fun spotting film's legion of guest stars, including James Brown, Cab Calloway, Aretha Franklin, Ray Charles, John Candy, Carrie Fisher, Steve Lawrence, Twiggy, Paul Reubens (aka Pee-Wee Herman), Frank Oz, and Steven Spielberg(n)

programme.title: Blues Brothers 2000
programme.desc: Upon his release from prison, now-brotherless Blues Brother Jake Elwood puts the band back together with the help of a golden-voiced strip joint bartender and a precocious 10-year-old orphan on loan from the comically abusive Sister Mary Stigmata. This hysterical sequel to the original Blues Brothers comedy/musical makes good use of its copious celebrity cameos, which include appearances from old schoolers James Brown, Aretha Franklin, Eric Clapton, Bo Diddley, and Isaac Hayes(n)

programme.title: Shoot 'Em Up

Now they've decided to extend their search to the warm beaches of the Isle of Palms just outside of Charleston, S.C. However, with a limited amount of inventory available, they hope their real-estate agent can find them the perfect vacation getaway without breaking the bank(n)

programme.title: Murder, She Wrote
programme.desc: Deadline for Murder. Eugene Roche is cast as veteran reporter Billy Simms, yet another longtime friend of Jessica Fletcher (Angela Lansbury). While recovering from a heart attack, Billy expresses the wish that something very, very bad would happen to the slimy publisher who took over Billy's former newspaper and turned it into a trashy tabloid. Sure enough, the publisher is murdered, casting suspicion not only on Billy but also Jessica, whose reputation had recently been slimed by the newspaper. programme.desc: Mr. Monk and the Candidate. Adrian Monk is a highly gifted detective whose career is jeopardised by his overwhelming fear of germs, crowds, small places, and almost everything else...(although he's making progress on milk). Monk's disorder was triggered by the murder of his beloved wife, Trudy, which continues to haunt him as the only unsolved mystery in his career. Ordered to take a leave of absence from the police department, Monk hires Sharona, a nurse who helps him try to get reinstated on the force, and in the process, becomes an unlikely Dr. Watson to his Sherlock Holmes. When the police department find themselves unable to crack a high-profile case, they have no choice but to bring back the only man for the job...phobias and all(n)

programme.title: Rambo: First Blood Part II
programme.desc: As Rambo (Sylvester Stallone) takes off for the second time to save U.S. POWs and fight at least two armies nearly single-handedly, he may not fly as convincingly as in his first, 1982 appearance, but he certainly lands as a buzz-word for the super-human macho hero. Stallone Rambos his way out of a prison camp with the help of his old Green Beret buddy Trautman (Richard Crenna), who arrives to free him for more active duty. It seems the U.S. government wants him to liberate those POWs - but does it? Rambo's ire reaches explosive levels when it turns out that the whole mission is PR for the American public. Fueled by fury, he rounds up the POWs and the action reaches its own explosive levels as he and a Vietnamese sidekick (Julia Nickson) fend off opposing forces and shepherd the POWs out of Vietnam. Wow(n)

programme.title: Rambo III
programme.desc: When Vietnam vet John Rambo discovers that his former commander is being held captive in Afghanistan, he undertakes a personal rescue mission. This big-budget action drama soon finds Rambo returning to his vigilante ways, single-handedly killing countless enemies during the course of his quest(n)

programme.title: Fearless
programme.desc: As Kevin's trial continues, the forensics seem to be proving his innocence and leading to an acquittal after 14 years, but the prosecution delivers a persuasive counter argument. With Heather and Sir Alastair keen to bring the case to a close, will Kevin accept a plea of manslaughter to secure his freedom? Meanwhile, Yusef Attar sends word that he is in the UK and wants to meet Emma, who travels to Birmingham to see him, tracked by Olivia Greenwood. Thriller, starring Helen McCrory and Michael Gambon.(n)

programme.title: Killer Women with Piers Morgan
programme.desc: Piers travels to Homestead Correctional Institution in Florida to meet Amber Wright, who, at the age of 15 conspired with a group of friends to murder her ex-boyfriend Seath Jackson, an innocent teenage boy who was beaten, shot, and knee-capped before his corpse was burnt and his remains thrown in a quarry. Later, Piers travels to meet Seath's parents in Summerfield, Florida, with their visceral anger standing in stark contrast to Amber's cool demeanour. It soon emerges that Amber was a central player in the plot to kill Seath, but will she take responsibility for her actions?.(n)

programme.title: The Kyle Files
programme.desc: This edition focuses on the issue of irresponsible driving, particularly when combined with the use of mobile phones at the wheel. Jeremy goes out on patrol with a specialist police team tackling what is known as the `Fatal Five' - speeding, driving without a seatbelt, driving while distracted, careless driving and being behind the wheel under the influence of drugs or drink. He also meets a man who openly admits to having driven under the influence of hard drugs.(n)

programme.title: Midsomer Murders
programme.desc: Farmer Alex Preston is found dead at the sacred Crowcall stone circle in Midsomer Mow. Suspicion initially falls on local druids led by high priests Ezra Canning and Leticia Clifford, since Preston's plans to plough Gorse Meadow would have barred their access to the site. Barnaby and Jones are joined by new pathologist Kate Wilding to investigate, and as the case wears on, the inspector becomes convinced greed rather than spiritualism is the motive. Starring Neil Dudgeon, Jason Hughes and Tamzin Malleson.(n)

programme.title: Davina McCall: Life at the Extreme
programme.desc: The TV presenter examines how animals survive in hostile environments by visiting some of the hottest, coldest, deepest and wettest places on Earth to experience life in extreme conditions. She begins in the deserts of Namibia in south-west Africa, and discovers it home to an incredibly diverse range of life despite the high temperatures and lack of water. Davina goes head-to-head in a running race against a cheetah, camps in the sand dunes overnight and stays with San bushpeople to learn the skills that they have developed to survive.(n)

programme.desc: During the making of a film, an old document comes to light that could tarnish the reputation of a Cabot Cove folk hero - and it is also connected to a murder. Angela Lansbury stars.(n)

programme.title: Agatha Christie's Marple
programme.desc: Ever since a beautiful American woman arrived in the peaceful village of Wychwood-under-Ashe, people have begun to die in a series of apparent accidents. Nobody suspects a killer is at work but, as the body count rises, Miss Marple digs a little deeper with the help of a former policeman - and they gradually unearth a secret that will rock the village to its core. Murder mystery, starring Julia McKenzie, Benedict Cumberbatch, David Haig, Sylvia Syms, Margo Stilley and Hugo Speer.(n)

programme.title: Law & Order: UK
programme.desc: Return of the detective drama starring Bradley Walsh. Ronnie and new partner Joe lead the investigation into the death of jeweller Harry Bernstein, who has been found with his hands and teeth missing. His wife, her lover and a former business associate are all possible suspects, but the case takes a surprising turn when the victim's sister receives a gruesome delivery. She's on the jury for the trial of a drug dealer and murderer who Ronnie has been trying to nail for years, and the threat to her points to jury tampering, so Jake and Kate have to take a dramatic approach to win the case. The problem is, they're up against a formidable defence barrister. Co-starring Ben Bailey Smith, Dominic Rowan and Georgia Taylor, with guests Helen Baxendale and Christopher Fulford.(n)

programme.title: The Street
programme.desc: Eddie agrees to attend a charity auction in a bid to impress his first love Pat - now married to his old friend Bob. His wife Margie initially agrees to go along, but decides to forego the event when she discovers a lump in her breast. A night of big spending and heavy drinking marks the start of a chain of unfortunate events that leave Eddie and his wife looking to each other for support. Timothy Spall and Ger Ryan star.(n)

programme.title: The Blonde Bombshell
programme.desc: Concluding part of the drama, chronicling the second half of Diana Dors' eventful life, including her return from Hollywood, subsequent bankruptcy and marriages to Dickie Dawson and Alan Lake. Amanda Redman stars in the title role, with Rupert Graves and Sheila Gish.(n)

programme.title: ITV3 Nightscreen
programme.desc: Text-based information service.(n)

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Buying goods from the comfort of home.(n)

programme.title: Man About the House
programme.desc: Chrissy and Robin borrow Mr Roper's car to drive to Southampton for a football match. However, the vehicle has similar qualities to its unreliable owner and soon breaks down leaving the duo having to summon help from an unexpected quarter. Comedy, with Richard O'Sullivan and Paula Wilcox.(n)

programme.title: Heartbeat
programme.desc: An elderly man reports an unusual break-in, during which the uninvited visitor left a mysterious statue on the kitchen table. It soon emerges that it is just the first in a series of unexplained events, as a police phone box arrives and then disappears from his garden, cement is delivered to his house for no apparent reason and a fire is started in his garage. Noakes advises Steve to keep well away as it is not technically a police matter, but the officer decides to investigate further. Rural drama, starring Trevor Ray, Georgie Glen and James Carlton.(n)

programme.title: Where the Heart Is
programme.desc: Sister Anna helps a prisoner to get leave to visit his sick father, Simon moves in with Henry, and Peggy reconsiders the nursing manager's job.(n)

programme.title: Wild at Heart
programme.desc: With Danny's career in ruins, the family keeps him busy looking after a group of young offenders staying at Leopard's Den, but the plan backfires when one of them takes a shine to Olivia. Meanwhile, Rowan hides a guilty secret about the incident that led to Danny's licence being revoked, and Caroline returns to the fold. Drama, starring Stephen Tompkinson, Olivia Scott-Taylor, Cal Macaninch and Hayley Mills.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy
programme.desc: Real-life small-claims cases on issues affecting family life, presided over by outspoken former New York judge Judy Sheindlin.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy
programme.desc: Real-life small-claims cases on issues affecting family life, presided over by outspoken former New York judge Judy Sheindlin.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy
programme.desc: Real-life small-claims cases on issues affecting family life, presided over by outspoken former New York judge Judy Sheindlin.(n)

programme.title: Road to Avonlea
programme.desc: Sara returns to the island with dreams of going to Paris, but both Hetty and Nanny Louisa have each made plans to take her on a trip with them.(n)

programme.title: Love Your Garden
programme.desc: In Moorland, Somerset, Alan Titchmarsh surprises the Colquhouns, a couple devastated by the floods of 2014, which arrived in the wake of a major health problem. Sheila had to undergo treatment for breast cancer, but after moving back home, in the year the couple will retire and celebrate their 40th wedding anniversary, Alan and the team attempt to transform their flood-wrecked garden.(n)

programme.title: Heartbeat
programme.desc: Vernon buys a batch of topsoil for his new compost-producing business, little suspecting it is from a contaminated landfill site. The shady dealer who sold him the soil winds up dead - as do a number of local cows - and Vernon is soon fighting for his life. Elsewhere, seductive sergeant Nokes sets her sights on Steve Crane, and Bellamy wonders whether Gina will return to Aidensfield and marry him. Geoffrey Hughes, James Carlton and Mark Jordon star.(n)

programme.title: The Royal
programme.desc: Johnny Lomax's proposal to Matron causes Nigel Harper to worry about the effect her decision will have on the hospital, and Jill comes into conflict with a strict Catholic family. Ormerod and Frankie face a tough rescue operation as they try to save an injured fisherman trapped on board a sinking ship, while Staff Nurse Taylor's plans for the future are thwarted once again.(n)

programme.title: Wild at Heart
programme.desc: As the anniversary of Sarah's death approaches, Du Plessis helps Olivia remember her mother by taking her on a trip into the Bush. However, when he ignores the symptoms of his worsening heart condition, it leads to disaster. Meanwhile, Danny is relieved to be back at work, but gets more than he bargained for as he and Alice deal with two rogue lions that are preying on local cattle. Drama, starring Deon Stewardson, Olivia Scott-Taylor, Stephen Tompkinson and Dawn Steele.(n)

programme.title: Man About the House
programme.desc: Robin regrets sampling Mr Roper's home brew when he is breathalysed during a driving lesson with Chrissy. Comedy series, with Richard O'Sullivan.(n)

programme.title: Rising Damp
programme.desc: New tenant Osborne seemingly dies after eating a bowl of Miss Jones' home-made soup, plunging the household into mourning - but Rigsby is the one who ends up being measured for a coffin. Classic comedy, starring Leonard Rossiter.(n)

programme.title: George and Mildred
programme.desc: The couple offer their services to a woman in labour, despite their lack of experience - though George does know how to dismantle a motorbike. Comedy, starring Brian Murphy and Yootha Joyce.(n)

programme.title: Heartbeat
programme.desc: Vernon buys a batch of topsoil for his new compost-producing business, little suspecting it is from a contaminated landfill site. The shady dealer who sold him the soil winds up dead - as do a number of local cows - and Vernon is soon fighting for his life. Elsewhere, seductive sergeant Nokes sets her sights on Steve Crane, and Bellamy wonders whether Gina will return to Aidensfield and marry him. Geoffrey Hughes, James Carlton and Mark Jordon star.(n)

programme.title: Murder, She Wrote
programme.desc: A scientist hits on the cunning idea of faking his own death, but is later murdered for real - leaving Jessica to prove the innocence of the police's chief suspect. Shannon Tweed guest stars, with Angela Lansbury, Bradford Dillman and Bruce Weitz.(n)

programme.title: The Booze Cruise 2: The Treasure Hunt
programme.desc: Sequel to the 2003 one-off comedy drama, in which Dave, Rob and Maurice embark on a two-day charity treasure hunt. They're joined by Dave's wife Cath, keen to make sure her husband sticks to his diet, Daniel, who's back from France and worrying he may not be the father of his pregnant wife's baby, and Marcus Forster, a potential client of Dave, who's not exactly the most pleasant fellow they've ever met. The only trouble is, everyone has to be nice to him if Dave's going to bag a new contract.(n)

programme.title: Law & Order: UK
programme.desc: While investigating the fatal stabbing of a psychiatrist with a caseload of violent adolescent patients, Ronnie and Joe's first instinct is to question those he was treating. However, the case takes a disturbing turn when the detectives discover a hidden sleeping compartment in the victim's office which has clearly been used recently by one of his underage visitors - and evidence comes to light suggesting he may have been having an affair with one of them. Drama, starring Bradley Walsh and Ben Bailey Smith, with Ramon Tikaram and Hattie Morahan.(n)

programme.title: Inspector Morse
programme.desc: An aristocrat goes missing, along with his collection of explicit erotic paintings - and Morse's investigation provides him with a close-up view of the upper crust's dark side. What is more, there is a further culture shock lying in wait - the prospect of working with a new female pathologist. Starring John Thaw, Kevin Whately, Amanda Hillwood, Patricia Hodge and Clifford Rose.(n)

programme.title: Football Rivalries
programme.desc: Featuring Manchester United and Liverpool.(n)

programme.title: Minder
programme.sub-title: The Long Ride Back to Scratchwood.
programme.desc: An ex-footballer persuades Arthur to buy 2,000 tickets for an England v Scotland football match. However, trouble ensues once it becomes apparent they are forgeries. George Cole and Dennis Waterman star.(n)

programme.title: Cash Cowboys
programme.desc: A man is ready to liquidate his collection of dinosaur fossils and other quirky items. Scott hunts for maritime treasures, and a seasoned picker reveals his impressive man cave.(n)

programme.title: The Saint
programme.desc: Mysterious events unfold involving a beautiful blonde, and Templar gets behind the wheel of a rally car. Last-ever episode of the vintage adventure series, starring Roger Moore.(n)

programme.title: Ironside
programme.desc: The Chief investigates a trail of false cheques and mental illness to discover exactly what happened to a vagrant murdered by a former cop living on the streets. Raymond Burr stars.(n)

programme.desc: Action from stage two of the most prestigious race on the calendar, featuring a flat 203.5km journey from Dusseldorf in Germany to Liege in Belgium.(n)

programme.desc: A stakeout in a bowling alley escalates into a full-scale alert when an atom bomb is discovered, primed and ready to detonate. Martin Shaw and Lewis Collins star in an instalment featuring a fleeting early appearance by Pamela Stephenson.(n)

programme.title: Storage Wars: New York
programme.desc: People bid for the contents of abandoned storage units. In Harlem, two buyers purchase a container and find a biker's jacket and a fur coat worth $3,000.(n)

programme.desc: Joe P Pauletich makes a huge profit after buying a unit for $1,500 containing lots of art. Candy Olsen and Courtney Wagner purchase a locker with a rare pair of dance shoes inside.(n)

The first stop is Tokyo, where they are immediately fish out of water and cannot even find their way out of the train station.(n)

programme.title: Caught on Camera
programme.sub-title: Car Crash Britain: Caught on Camera.
programme.desc: Jamie Theakston narrates the documentary featuring another selection of real-life incidents captured by people on their personal cameras. Highlights include a man who nearly gets taken out by an unsecured load on a van, road rage incidents and a motorist taking impromptu lessons in aquaplaning after a terrifying incident on a wet motorway.(n)

programme.title: Total Recall
programme.desc: A construction worker pays to have fake memories of a dream holiday implanted into his brain, but discovers his mind has already been tampered with - apparently to erase his true identity as a secret agent from a colony on Mars. He journeys to the planet in search of the truth, but is drawn into a conflict between the tyrannical ruler and a rebel faction. Paul Verhoeven's sci-fi thriller, starring Arnold Schwarzenegger, Rachel Ticotin and Michael Ironside.(n)

programme.title: Storage Wars
programme.desc: Darrell and Ivy battle it out at a locker auction in Lancaster, California, while Jarrod and Brandi buy some DJ equipment.(n)

programme.title: The Professionals
programme.desc: Bodie and Doyle learn an assassin has been hired to murder one of the delegates at an anti-terrorist conference and set about discovering the identity of the killer's target. Drama, starring Martin Shaw and Lewis Collins.(n)

programme.title: Storage Wars: New York
programme.desc: Joe `P' Pauletich buys a unit for $2,500 containing lots of antiques and furniture, while Mike Braiotta purchases a storage locker for $300 with two sailboats inside.(n)

programme.title: Storage Wars: New York
programme.desc: Tad Eaton and Chris Morelli buy a unit for $325 containing lots of furniture, and also identify a gold watch that could make them a handsome profit.(n)

programme.title: Tour de France Highlights
programme.desc: Action from stage four of the most prestigious race on the calendar, featuring a flat 207.5km journey from Mondorf-les-Bains to Vittel.(n)

programme.title: Monster Carp
programme.desc: Fisherman Ali Hamidi seeks out giant carp across the world, and in each episode he is joined by two guest anglers to help him in his quest.(n)

programme.title: Benidorm
programme.desc: Mateo reveals his home life is a disaster - his mother-in-law Dolores is threatening to kill him - so Lesley urges the barman to move out and start a new life. But will it be that easy? Clive, Tiger and Terri come up with a plan to retrieve Clive's 5,000 euros from dodgy property developer Monty, while Psychic Sue drops by Blow & Go with a message for Liam. Jacqueline and Glynn look forward to a reunion with their real partners, but when Riannon arrives, there's no sign of Donald. Guest starring Ruth Madoc (Hi-de-Hi!).(n)

programme.title: Eraser
programme.desc: An arms industry executive is placed in danger after she exposes evidence of illegal deals by an international corporation. The authorities respond by assigning her to the custody of a government agent who specialises in helping federal witnesses disappear from the system. However, when the operative is framed for murder, he is forced to balance his duties with efforts to clear his own name. Action thriller, starring Arnold Schwarzenegger, James Caan, Vanessa L Williams and James Coburn.(n)

programme.title: Robin of Sherwood
programme.desc: Robin is bewitched by evil sorceress Lilith, who sends him on a mission to steal the magical silver arrow from Herne's cave. Michael Praed stars.(n)

programme.title: Peak Practice
programme.desc: Dawn's son slips into a coma, leaving surgeons in a state of confusion as to what could have brought about his rapid deterioration. It's not long before estranged father Keith turns up on the scene, adding to the air of tension as his wife's involvement with Andrew comes to light. Medical drama, starring Gary Mavers, Haydn Gwynne and Sarah Parish.(n)

programme.title: Upstairs, Downstairs
programme.desc: Richard's envious brother Arthur visits and, having witnessed dubious behaviour from Hudson - namely dressing up as a gentleman - he engineers a meeting between him and his employer. Classic period drama, starring Gordon Jackson, Jean Marsh and Simon Williams.(n)

programme.title: Always and Everyone
programme.desc: Christine is shocked to learn where her husband's affections really lie, and Robert challenges Louise to prove she is worthy of a place on his team, prompting her to consider moving on. Stuart is shaken by a patient's unexpected deterioration - especially as he had assured her parents there was nothing to worry about. Medical drama, starring Martin Shaw and Niamh Cusack.(n)

programme.title: Heartbeat
programme.desc: An Army deserter arrives in the village following a bust-up with his sadistic sergeant and causes problems for the Rowans when he starts stealing food to survive. The fugitive is only discovered when Nick investigates a series of break-ins around the village. Rural police drama, starring Nick Berry and Niamh Cusack.(n)

programme.title: The Grand
programme.desc: Maggie confides an intimate secret to an old friend, while Ruth learns that John and Sarah had a daughter. Drama, starring Mark McGann and Michael Siberry.(n)

programme.title: Mapp and Lucia
programme.desc: The duo are swept out to sea in a storm. Period drama, starring Geraldine McEwan and Prunella Scales.(n)

programme.title: Robin of Sherwood
programme.sub-title: The Swords of Wayland - Part One.
programme.desc: Part one of two. Robin and the outlaws leave Sherwood to defend a distant village from a band of phantom horsemen known as the Hounds of Lucifer, who terrorise the countryside on the orders of a powerful coven ruled by Morgwyn of Ravenscar. Guest starring Rula Lenska.(n)

programme.title: Peak Practice
programme.desc: New boy Sam Morgan breaks all the rules and gets emotionally involved with a patient, jeopardising his career at the Beeches almost before it's begun. Joseph Millson stars, with Gary Mavers and Haydn Gwynne.(n)

programme.title: Heartbeat
programme.desc: Nick and Kate must act quickly when a woman takes an overdose, in the belief that her husband has been falsely imprisoned. Meanwhile, Phil learns Jennifer is pregnant and agrees to marry her, but may not survive his stag night at the pub. Rural drama, starring Nick Berry, Niamh Cusack and Mark Jordan.(n)

programme.title: Upstairs, Downstairs
programme.desc: The disgraced Elizabeth returns to Eaton Place with her unwanted child and former nursemaid in tow. Sarah is assigned as the nanny's helper, but becomes concerned about the elderly woman's ability to care for Lucy properly. Classic period drama, starring Gordon Jackson, Jean Marsh and Simon Williams.(n)

programme.title: Always and Everyone
programme.desc: An outbreak of food poisoning hits everyone in the A&E department except David, leaving him to cope with a succession of difficult patients including an ailing Elvis impersonator and a traumatised overdose victim. At first it seems like just the opportunity he's been waiting for to prove himself - but as the pressure mounts, he's left agonising over whether to throw in the towel and call Robert Kingsford for help. David Partridge, Martin Shaw and Niamh Cusack star.(n)

programme.title: Agatha Christie's Poirot
programme.desc: When a spate of petty thefts culminates in a series of murders at a student hostel, the Belgian sleuth is called in to investigate. Mystery, starring David Suchet, with Philip Jackson, Pauline Moran, Damian Lewis and Paris Jefferson.(n)

programme.title: Little Boy Blue
programme.desc: New series. Fact-based crime drama about the fatal shooting of 11-year-old Rhys Jones as he walked home from football practice in Croxteth, Liverpool, caught in the crossfire of a feud between rival gangs. Detective Superintendent Dave Kelly is charged with bringing his teenage killer to justice, but thought the assailant's identity is well known, finding the evidence to charge him proves to be a far more difficult challenge. Stephen Graham stars.(n)

programme.title: The Americans
programme.desc: Philip and Elizabeth have qualms about a new assignment, while Stan makes a move that could throw his career at the FBI into turmoil.(n)

programme.title: Prime Suspect 1973
programme.desc: Crime drama prequel following the early career of Jane Tennison, as she starts out as a single-minded 22-year-old probationary officer in 1970s London, where chauvinism and rule-bending are the norm. Jane is thrown into a brutal murder inquiry when the body of a teenage girl, Julie-Ann Collins, is found in the underground car park of a Hackney housing estate, while the family of local crime matriarch Renee Bentley are shaken by a violent attack on her. Stefanie Martini steps into the shoes of Helen Mirren to bring the character back to the small screen, with Sam Reid, Blake Harrison and Alun Armstrong also starring.(n)

programme.title: Vera
programme.desc: A murder at a remote cottage in Northumberland takes DCI Vera Stanhope back to a place full of childhood memories and reminds her of an unsolved case from earlier in her career. Delving into the local politics surrounding a controversial proposal to dig a quarry, she and her team find motives in the unlikeliest of places - until they realise that the truth could be hidden within the land itself. Detective drama, adapted from Ann Cleeves' novel The Crow Trap, guest starring Daniela Nardini (This Life) alongside Brenda Blethyn.(n)

programme.title: Agatha Christie's Poirot
programme.desc: The dapper detective accepts an invitation to spend yuletide at the house of an elderly millionaire who seems intent on provoking his money-grubbing sons into murdering him. At first he tries hard to ignore the strained atmosphere and relax - but soon finds himself with a gruesome mystery on his hands. Agatha Christie whodunit, starring David Suchet and Philip Jackson.(n)

programme.desc: Georgie succumbs to a mystery illness and refuses to appear in public, giving rise to a flurry of speculation in Tilling and prompting Lucia to investigate. Period comedy, starring Geraldine McEwan and Nigel Hawthorne.(n)

programme.title: Robin of Sherwood
programme.sub-title: The Swords of Wayland - Part Two.
programme.desc: Part two of two. Robin's sword Albion falls into the hands of Morgwyn and her coven, who prepare to use it in a ceremony to invoke the forces of evil. Michael Praed and Rula Lenska star.(n)

programme.title: Peak Practice
programme.desc: Sam makes an unusual bet with a smoker anxious to quit, and Joanna confides in pub landlady Rita, while Andrew tries to help a farmer whose failing health has prompted him to run amok in Cardale, leaving a trail of devastation behind him. Joseph Millson, Haydn Gwynne and Gary Mavers star.(n)

programme.title: Heartbeat
programme.desc: Kate's ex-boyfriend turns up in Aidensfield and finds himself under suspicion for a hit-and-run accident. Meanwhile, Bellamy finds himself in charge of organising a local talent contest. Rural police drama, starring Niamh Cusack and Mark Jordon.(n)

programme.title: Upstairs, Downstairs
programme.desc: Lady Southwold, Lady Marjorie's widowed mother, and her companion Miss Hodges arrive, throwing the household into turmoil. Later, the staff below stairs are dismayed to hear that a brooch has apparently been stolen.(n)

programme.title: Always and Everyone
programme.desc: The team battles to save two youngsters with gunshot wounds. Stuart is haunted by a promise he makes to a dying man. To Mike's surprise, Cathy announces she is leaving. Christine makes a decision about her future.(n)

programme.title: Agatha Christie's Poirot
programme.sub-title: The Adventure of the Western Star.
programme.desc: A Belgian film star arrives in London and summons her friend Poirot to unravel the mysterious threats she has been receiving, which demand the return of a priceless diamond, the Western Star. Rosalind Bennett guest stars.(n)

programme.title: Agatha Christie's Poirot
programme.desc: The detective investigates when a victim of fraud is found murdered on a golf course - but his inquiries are complicated by the discovery of a tramp's mutilated body nearby. To make matters worse, beautiful singer Bella Duveen is also around, seemingly intent on helping herself to a grim souvenir. David Suchet stars, with Hugh Fraser, Bill Moody and Jacinta Mulcahy.(n)

programme.title: Vera
programme.desc: The crime drama returns with an episode based on Ann Cleeves' recently published novel Harbour Street. Vera investigates the death of a pensioner found stabbed on a train at the height of rush hour. The case has a huge impact on Joe's home life when his daughter is named as a key witness, and he struggles to maintain a professional distance. The trail leads the team to a quiet Northumberland coastal town where clues appear to lead to one particular street - but why are the residents so reluctant to talk? Starring Brenda Blethyn, with David Leon, Sonya Cassidy, Jon Morrison and Eva Birthistle.(n)

programme.desc: A team of investigators responds to reports of animal cruelty, rescuing pets and dealing with abusive owners.(n)

programme.title: Deadly Revenge
programme.desc: A lonely woman falls into a whirlwind romance with her handsome colleague, only to find that he harbors a sinister secret that may be the death of her. Cate was in Los Angeles working on a major project for a prominent architectural firm when her professional relationship with Harrison began to turn personal. Meanwhile, Cate also grows close to Harrison's mother Evelyn, who reveals that her son has never been the same since his high school sweetheart vanished without a trace. When Harrison proposes to Cate it feels like they're meant for one another. But just then, Evelyn falls ill with cancer, and Cate starts to experience some disturbing signs of sickness. Things turn tense when Cate starts to suspect that Harrison is poisoning her just as he did with his old flame, but by the time she uncovers the terrifying truth about her fiancé's past, it may already be too late for her(n)

programme.title: A Place in the Sun: Home or Away
programme.desc: Serial renovators Lynn and Kerry cannot decide between starting a new project in the Chelmsford area where they currently live, or building a snorkelling business in Majorca, Spain. Sara Damergi and Jasmine Harman try to help them make a decision as they view properties in both regions.(n)

programme.title: Four in a Bed
programme.desc: Owner Alfie Bubbles and former Brookside star Philip Olivier welcome guests to a Beatles-themed hotel - The Yellow Submarine - in Liverpool. However, one guest is unimpressed when she falls ill on a sea voyage, and breakfast turns into a comedy of errors.(n)

programme.title: Four in a Bed
programme.desc: Megan Edgcumbe and Dick Stanley host the latest round of the competition at Manor Lodge in Cornwall. Things get off to a good start when the guests find their rooms clean, but later the hostess reveals her upper-class background and a Cumberland sausage causes a stir at breakfast.(n)

programme.title: Four in a Bed
programme.desc: James and Judith Calderbank invite their fellow competitors to the rural Ashculme House in Devon for the third visit of the week, but the couple's back-to-basics approach does not go down well with all the guests. Workaholic Alfie worries that having no phone signal will affect his business, while competitive Megan and Dick relish finding dust in the outside building.(n)

programme.title: Four in a Bed
programme.desc: The competitors have great expectations of Kevin Wainwright and partner David Little's Satis House in Suffolk, but the last visit of the week sees old resentments resurface as Megan and Dick eagerly point out faults in the hosts' presentation - including an oversight in their room and overly crispy bacon for breakfast.(n)

programme.title: Four in a Bed
programme.desc: The contestants meet one last time to discover how much they have been paid by their fellow hoteliers and to air their grievances. Alfie and rival owner Megan engage in a debate about breakfasts and heating, while David and Kevin become a little emotional before the week's winner is announced.(n)

programme.title: A Place in the Sun: Summer Sun
programme.desc: Sara Damergi helps Teresa Lynch search for a property in the western Algarve, Portugal. With dramatically falling house prices, she hopes her budget of £120,000 will be enough to fulfil her lifelong dream of living on the country's coast.(n)

programme.title: A Place in the Sun: Summer Sun
programme.desc: Sara Damergi helps Niel and Jean Soley find a holiday home that can also be used once they retire near Huelva in southern Spain. The couple have been dreaming of buying such a property for seven years and want enough space so that all their family can come to stay, and give the property expert a budget of £210,000 to work with.(n)

programme.title: Time Team
programme.desc: Tony Robinson and the team visit Northamptonshire to assess a Saxon skeleton discovered by surprised homeowners Morris and Pat Jones while digging a pond in their back garden. Phil Harding and the archaeological experts look for a forgotten graveyard.(n)

programme.title: Time Team
programme.desc: Tony Robinson and the team hunt for the remains of a Roman villa in Somerset unexpectedly discovered by a farmer who unearthed a decorative floor underneath his pigsties. During three days of searching, they uncover a field crammed full of beautiful mosaics.(n)

programme.title: Car SOS
programme.desc: Presenter Tim Shaw and master mechanic Fuzz Townshend visit petrol-head Kim in Hampshire, the owner of an accident-damaged 1995 Nissan Skyline GT-R. The team take on the challenge of transforming her Japanese supercar into a street racer's dream.(n)

programme.title: The Supervet
programme.desc: Noel treats a Labrador that is both a guide for the blind and a seizure alert dog, and has become lame in both its front legs. Invasive surgery could mean that the dog's owner, Toni, is without her lifeline. Meanwhile, a couple hope that surgery will save their Rhodesian Ridgeback's leg from a cancerous tumour, and Fitzpatrick Referrals receptionist Natalie's Tibetan terrier becomes unwell.(n)

programme.title: The Supervet
programme.desc: A family rush their Chihuahua, Darcy, to the clinic after it is hit by a car. For 18-year-old TaJournee, who is autistic, the dog is a lifeline, and Noel must use pins, nuts and bolts to reconstruct the broken pieces of its crushed pelvis. Meanwhile, the vet finds himself in a tricky situation while performing replacement surgery on a seven-year-old spaniel with hip problems, and a Winchester Prison sniffer dog that is lame in both elbows is brought to the surgery.(n)

programme.title: Grand Designs
programme.desc: In 2010, architectural designer Lincoln Miles and artist Lisa Traxler found an uninspiring 1970s bungalow on a plot on the Isle of Wight surrounded by ancient woodland. As part of their renovation project, they added a three-storey `tower' extension and used a range of unconventional techniques and alternative materials. Two years later, Kevin McCloud returned to find out whether the couple's methods led to success.(n)

programme.title: China's Forgotten Emperor
programme.desc: Documentary about Wu Zetian, the only woman to become emperor of China. Wu Zetian ruled China in the last years of the seventh century, and has always had a reputation as a brutal tyrant. However, recent archaeological finds have shed new light on her reign, revealing a gifted politician who shaped her country into a military, economic and cultural superpower. The programme examines tombs, palaces and treasures from her dynasty that highlight her skills as a leader and also the violence of her regime.(n)

programme.title: 24 Hours in A&E
programme.desc: Michelle, who's 54, is airlifted to St George's after being involved in a car crash with her husband Paul in Surrey. She was given a blood transfusion at the scene and doctors work quickly to get her to CT to ascertain the full extent of her injuries. Cameras also follow Derren, 41, who has fractured his ankle while trampolining with his 12-year-old daughter, Macie.(n)

programme.title: Kinky Britain
programme.desc: Documentary exploring the bizarre and highly lucrative business of bespoke online fetish video production, following British amateur film-makers making their fortunes catering to other people's fantasies.(n)

programme.title: Ramsay's Kitchen Nightmares USA
programme.desc: The chef travels to La Grange, a suburb of Chicago, to help the owners of Cafe 36, an upmarket bistro threatening to destroy the marriage of its owners due to the scale of their financial losses. The head chef's attitude to quality control is driving customers away, and it is up to Gordon Ramsay to turn the business around.(n)

programme.title: 24 Hours in A&E
programme.desc: Michelle, who's 54, is airlifted to St George's after being involved in a car crash with her husband Paul in Surrey. She was given a blood transfusion at the scene and doctors work quickly to get her to CT to ascertain the full extent of her injuries. Cameras also follow Derren, 41, who has fractured his ankle while trampolining with his 12-year-old daughter, Macie.(n)

programme.title: Grand Designs
programme.desc: In 2010, architectural designer Lincoln Miles and artist Lisa Traxler found an uninspiring 1970s bungalow on a plot on the Isle of Wight surrounded by ancient woodland. As part of their renovation project, they added a three-storey `tower' extension and used a range of unconventional techniques and alternative materials. Two years later, Kevin McCloud returned to find out whether the couple's methods led to success.(n)

programme.title: 8 Out of 10 Cats Uncut
programme.desc: Extended version of the irreverent panel show hosted by Jimmy Carr. Teams captained by Jon Richardson and Sean Lock answer questions based on opinion polls carried out around the country to see who best understands what is going on in Britain today. With guests David Hasselhoff, Rachel Riley, Rob Beckett and Justin Moorhouse.(n)

programme.title: A Place in the Sun: Summer Sun
programme.desc: Sara Damergi helps Teresa Lynch search for a property in the western Algarve, Portugal. With dramatically falling house prices, she hopes her budget of £120,000 will be enough to fulfil her lifelong dream of living on the country's coast.(n)

programme.title: Four in a Bed
programme.desc: The contest begins at Wizards Thatch in Alderley Edge, a village in Cheshire. Owners Ian Lambert and his partner Ali Imiolek hope to cast a spell over the competition, but their guests end up picking out problems with the continental breakfast basket.(n)

programme.title: Four in a Bed
programme.desc: The competition moves to Blackpool, where James Reay and Simon Dooley run the one-star Winterbourne Hotel and Theatre Showbar. The contestants seem to be relaxed and impressed, but a rival's feedback sends one of the hosts storming out of the room.(n)

programme.title: Four in a Bed
programme.desc: Perfectionist Andrea Hickmott and her partner Nick Bonner-Williams welcome their guests to Northrise Lodge in Hastings, East Susses, but the rooms are criticised and deemed too clinical to relax in. Andrea also panics when she forgets to put sugar on the tables at breakfast.(n)

programme.title: Four in a Bed
programme.desc: Stephanie and Dominic Parker, (who later found fame in Gogglebox) welcome the rest of the contestants to their B&B, the Salutation in Sandwich, Kent. However, an alcohol-fuelled evening of parlour games jeopardises the hosts' chances to win the prize.(n)

programme.title: Four in a Bed
programme.desc: The contestants meet one last time to discover how much they have been paid by their fellow hoteliers and to air their grievances. A wedding proposal appears to be on the cards, and the winner is announced.(n)

programme.title: A Place in the Sun: Summer Sun
programme.desc: Sara Damergi helps Claire Streets and Jon Jevons find a new home in the Andalusia region of Spain. With a budget of £150,000, the Nottinghamshire couple hope to find a property with enough land for them to set up a luxury camping business.(n)

programme.title: A Place in the Sun: Summer Sun
programme.desc: Sara Damergi helps Richard and Janie Wood search for a new property in the Almeria region of Spain on a budget of £80,000. Richard suffers from ill health and believes his pain could be alleviated by a move to warmer climes.(n)

programme.title: Time Team
programme.desc: Tony Robinson and the team of experts set out to uncover the facts behind a collection of human bones - some of which appear to be children's - found in a Derbyshire cave. A possibly prehistoric burial mound located near the site could hold the answers.(n)

programme.title: Time Team
programme.sub-title: Fetlar, Shetland Islands: The Giant's Grave.
programme.desc: The experts go in search of clues to the contents of an enigmatic cliff-top mound on Fetlar in the Shetlands known as the Giant's Grave. Battling the weather, they set out to discover whether it is connected to pieces of Viking pottery found in a nearby garden and unearth rare and extraordinary finds in three days.(n)

programme.title: Car SOS
programme.desc: Tim, Fuzz and the team work on a 1963 Alfa Romeo Giulia Spider that has been kept in a dusty barn in Essex after its owner's plans to restore it were interrupted by the onset of a serious medical condition.(n)

programme.title: The Supervet
programme.desc: A one-year-old St Bernard suffering with hip dysplasia is brought to the clinic by the Warden family. Having recently lost the the dog's brother to a similar illness, emotions are running high. Meanwhile, Noel treats a 13-year-old Collie that has been hit by a car, and tries to devise a new bionic paw for a cat with a badly deformed hind foot.(n)

programme.title: The Supervet
programme.desc: A four-year-old chinchilla arrives for surgery on a broken leg, but his tiny airways and bones make it a difficult procedure. Meanwhile, a puppy is rushed to the veterinary practice after being hit by a van, and Noel must deal with the risk of infection as he fights to save its limb. Plus, a Labrador undergoes an awkward operation for two bulging discs.(n)

programme.title: Grand Designs
programme.desc: In 2010, Claire Farrow and Ian Hogarth built a home containing a sauna, spa, dance floor and DJ booth on a small patch of land in Kensington, central London. It was a notorious project with several setbacks - including their digger smashing into a neighbour's wall and the re-emergence of the old river under the building. These threatened to prevent them completing the project, but two years later Kevin McCloud revisits the duo to see how things have progressed.(n)

programme.title: The Yorkshire Dales and the Lakes

programme.title: The Baby Boomers' Guide to Growing Old

programme.desc: Gordon Ramsay revisits some of the restaurants that he set out to save, including The Mixing Bowl, The Olde Stone Mill, Peter's and Campania. Have their owners pulled themselves out of their nightmares?.(n)

programme.title: MasterChef: The Professionals
programme.desc: New series. Six aspiring chefs compete in the cookery contest, beginning with a test of their basic skills. The first contestants must make the French dessert, a Floating Island, while the remaining three have to cook a blue steak with a green peppercorn sauce in 15 minutes. Finally, the six chefs cook their own signature dish for judges Monica Galetti, Gregg Wallace and Marcus Wareing. It is their last chance to show off their culinary talent before three of them are sent home, and three become quarter finalists.(n)

programme.title: Don't Tell the Bride

Will this be his bride's idea of perfection - or will his ideas see him get dragged through the mud?.(n)

programme.title: Unforgotten
programme.desc: With the suspects in the murder of David Walker all having either a motive, opportunity or connection to the victim, Cassie and Sunny are left with a massive puzzle to solve. Cassie soon focuses in on Sara, whose alibi seems too perfect, as if it has been put together by an accomplice of the ex-prostitute - and the team is soon investigating the possibility of a wider revenge plan. Meanwhile, interviews with Colin and Marion's loved ones prove revealing. Cold case crime drama, starring Nicola Walker and Sanjeev Bhaskar, with Badria Timimi, Mark Bonnar and Rosie Cavaliero. Last in the series.(n)

programme.title: NCIS: New Orleans
programme.desc: The team's efforts to track down 900lbs of stolen explosives are stalled when a bomb goes off in the city. The amount used still leaves the unknown terrorists with enough high explosive to level a large portion of the city. When Russo reveals Homeland Security knew the attack was orchestrated by a gang of South African mercenaries, Brody is forced to question what her new lover's real agenda might be. The situation becomes even more awkward when it becomes clear Russo has been involved in a string of cases that resulted in mysterious fatalities. While Pride and Sonja head out in search of the remaining explosives, Brody works together with Patton and Sebastian to investigate her new boyfriend's credentials. For the first time, bosses have allowed cameras to delve behind the scenes of their production line in Poole, and into the rarefied world of the multi-millionaire's favourite plaything. The film follows the build of their first £20million, 40-metre vessel, which has been ordered by an exacting customer who's taken advantage of the firm's `made-to-measure' service. Meanwhile, the London-based sales team works to fill orders during the all-important boat show season.(n)

programme.title: Motorway Patrol
programme.desc: Documentary following members of the New Zealand highway patrol as they witness some of the best and worst behaviour on the nation's motorways. The series is centred around the roads of Auckland, the country's largest urban area, and features motoring chaos including major traffic collisions, escaped animals and pedestrians on busy roads. There is also footage of drivers falling asleep at the wheel, overloaded vehicles and suspects caught with illegal substances - plus a host of excuses as the people pulled over try to persuade officers they have not done anything wrong.(n)

programme.title: The Flash
programme.desc: Dr Wells receives a blast from the past when former protege Hartley Rathaway returns to town with a taste for revenge. But his is not an idle threat - caught up in the same explosion as the Flash, he now has the power to manipulate soundwaves, making him a potentially deadly enemy who wants to be known as the Pied Piper. Meanwhile, Iris is on the hunt for headlines when she joins Central City Picture News, although she's not keen on the reporter she's been partnered with.(n)

programme.title: Arrow
programme.desc: Oliver feels conflicted after Laurel asks his alter-ego to look into Sebastian Blood - and when the pair get close to discovering the truth, Sebastian leaks damaging information about Lauren. Roy showcases his newfound skills to Sin, who wants to see how far they can be stretched - culminating in a chain of events that have potentially deadly consequences.(n)

programme.title: DC's Legends of Tomorrow
programme.desc: Having seen a frightening future, time-traveller Rip Hunter decides to put together a disparate group of heroes and villains to save the world from the unstoppable threat posed by immortal tyrant Vandal Savage. In 2166, Rip travels 150 years back in time to choose people with the skills to save mankind, assembling a team including Firestorm, the Atom, White Canary, Hawkgirl, Hawkman Captain Cold and Heatwave. First of a two-part pilot episode of the superhero adventure, starring Arthur Darvill and Casper Crump.(n)

programme.title: The Blacklist
programme.desc: One of the world's most wanted fugitives surrenders himself to the FBI, claiming to have vital information on dangerous criminals and terrorists who have never been brought to justice. However, Red has one condition - he will only speak to rookie profiler Liz, and nobody knows why he is so interested in her. Another chance to see the first episode of the drama, starring James Spader, Megan Boone, Diego Klattenhoff, Harry Lennix, Ryan Eggold and Parminder Nagra.(n)

programme.title: Arrow
programme.desc: The vigilante offers to train Roy to help keep his super-powers in check, but the rebellious teen refuses to listen unless his mentor reveals his identity. Bronze Tiger escapes from prison with a plot to steal Malcolm's earthquake machine and sell it to the highest bidder, and Moira faces a big decision when Walter asks her out for dinner.(n)

programme.title: DC's Legends of Tomorrow
programme.desc: Conclusion of the two-part pilot episode. Stein makes a mistake that puts all of their lives in jeopardy and a piece of the Atom's suit falls into the wrong hands, while,Snart and Rory hatch a plan to steal the key to defeating Savage.(n)

programme.title: The Blacklist
programme.desc: A notorious assassin known as the Freelancer is planning a hit, requiring Red and Liz to go undercover to stop his evil trade. As they do so, Agent Ressler tries to protect his profiler from afar, still unsure about Red's dubious motives - but Liz is more puzzled by her husband's box of fake passports, wondering if the threat to her safety could be closer to home. Crime drama, starring James Spader and Megan Boone.(n)
